description: Searches the specified directory for a group. You can find groups that match the SearchString parameter with the value of their attributes included in the SearchString parameter. This operation supports pagination with the use of the NextToken request and response parameters. If more results are available, the SearchGroups.NextToken member contains a token that you pass in the next call to SearchGroups. This retrieves the next set of items. You can also specify a maximum number of return results with the MaxResults parameter.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of the directory that's associated with the group.

parameters.name: Realm
parameters.description: The domain name that's associated with the group.

parameters.name: SearchAttributes
parameters.description: One or more data attributes that are used to search for a group. For a list of supported attributes, see Directory Service Data Attributes. (string) ---

parameters.name: SearchString
parameters.description: The attribute value that you want to search for.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The identifier (ID) of the directory that's associated with the group.

nested_items.name: Groups
nested_items.description: The group information that the request returns.

nested_items.name: DistinguishedName
nested_items.description: The distinguished name of the object.

nested_items.name: GroupScope
nested_items.description: The scope of the AD group. For details, see Active Directory security groups.

nested_items.name: GroupType
nested_items.description: The AD group type. For details, see Active Directory security group type.

nested_items.name: OtherAttributes
nested_items.description: An expression of one or more attributes, data types, and the values of a group.

nested_items.name: BOOL
nested_items.description: Indicates that the attribute type value is a boolean. For example:

nested_items.name: N
nested_items.description: Indicates that the attribute type value is a number. For example:

nested_items.name: S
nested_items.description: Indicates that the attribute type value is a string. For example:

nested_items.name: SS
nested_items.description: Indicates that the attribute type value is a string set. For example:

nested_items.name: SID
nested_items.description: The unique security identifier (SID) of the group.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An encoded paging token for paginated calls that can be passed back to retrieve the next page.

nested_items.name: Realm
nested_items.description: The domain that's associated with the group.
